ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 2
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Like the other guy said, your kicks are magical, cause all of the monk s special attacks are magical, at least as far as I ve read.  I don t think just
ygData.messageBody:
>
> Greetings Brothers,
>
> Kicks are magic as soon as you put on the gloves for
> some reason...
>
> I am not complaining...
>
> Be well all,
>
> Lenyong
> Bertoxxulous

Like the other guy said, your kicks are magical, 'cause all of the monk's
special attacks are magical, at least as far as I've read. I don't think
just Kick is but you get Round Kick at such a low level (before you even
need to consider taking on magic-only enemies) that you don't really have to
worry about your special attack being magical, just need to worry about your
hands. I also heard rumors about your attacks being magical at level 17 but
I would think most would have looked for magic gloves by then anyway, so I
don't really know, and I suspect it's false. If anyone knows this rumor to
be true or false, please reply :)
